metadata.title: CVE-2013-4555 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ecrire/action/logout.phpin SPIP before 2.1.24 allows remote attackers to hijack the authenticationof arbitrary users for requests that logout the user via unspecifiedvectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4555` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.0.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.14-1').
